0.title: Introduction to Computational Thinking with Data

1.title: Offerings
1.content: . | Summer 2022 | Summer 2021 | Spring 2021 | . From the course catalog: This course is an introduction to computational thinking and quantitative reasoning, designed to prepare students for further coursework in data science, computer science, and statistics (in particular, Foundations of Data Science, Data C8). This course emphasizes the use of computation to gain insight about quantitative problems with real data from the social sciences.

3.title: Announcements
3.content: Announcements are stored in the _announcements directory and rendered according to the layout file, _layouts/announcement.html.

4.title: Week 1 Announcement
4.content: Apr 8 · 0 min read . | Create a new repository based on Just the Class. | Configure a publishing source for GitHub Pages. Your course website is now live! | Update _config.yml with your course information. | Edit and create .md Markdown files to add your content. | .

6.title: Introduction to Computational Thinking with Data
6.content: UC Berkeley, Summer 2022 . Instructors: James Weichert (jweichert@berkeley.edu), Will Furtado (willfurtado@berkeley.edu) .

7.title: Announcements
7.content: . | announcements, | a course calendar, | a staff page, | and a weekly schedule. | .

8.title: Week 1 — Introduction to Python
8.content: Jul 5 1 Introduction, Course Overview, Jupyter Basics Slides • Code Optional Reading Jul 6 2 Variables and Types Slides • Code Lab 0 Using Jupyter Notebooks Jul 7 3 NumPy and Data Slides • Code Homework 1 Introduction to Python  Due Jul 14 @ 11:59PM Jul 8 Discussion 2 Health Data

9.title: Week 2 — Visualizing Data
9.content: Jul 11 4 Table Fundamentals, Introduction to Visualization Slides • Code Optional Reading Jul 12 5 Visualizing Categorical Variables Slides • Code Lab 1 Visualization Fundamentals Jul 13 6 Visualizing Numerical Variables Slides • Code Lab 2 More Visualization Jul 14 7 Visualizing Two Numerical Variables, Quiz Review Slides • Code Homework 2 Data Visualization  Due Jul 21 @ 11:59PM Jul 15 Discussion 1 Human Contexts and Ethics Just the Class is a template that extends the popular Just the Docs theme, which provides a robust and thoroughly-tested foundation for your website. Just the Docs include features such as: . | automatic navigation structure, | instant, full-text search and page indexing, | and a set of UI components and authoring utilities. | .
